name: Climaniacs
description:
Indiecade Demo

"A multiplayer game featuring crazy goats trying to get to the top of the highest mountains.

Collect as many as flowers as you can to reach 500 points and win the game while avoiding dangerous predators and slippery edges of the mountain."

Developers

Nina Mirhabibi @Nmirab - mirhabibinina.wix.com/portfolio

Genaro Vallejo Reyes @GenaroGenon

Code

Genaro Vallejo Reyes

Art and Animation

Nina Mirhabibi

Music

Mario Vallejo @mariov4llejo

Controls

Game Pad (Tested with PS4 controllers)

Move........Left Joystick

Jump......X Button

Attack......Circle+Joystick

Reset........L2

Keyboard

Player 1

Move........WASD

Jump.......Space

Reset........Escape

Player 2

Move........Key Arrows

Jump........Return/Enter

Reset........Delete
